name: Prioritizing Purpose: A Strategic Blueprint for Building Value-Based DAOs
description: Weâ€™ll explore our philosophy, process, and tech stack behind building a 501c3 nonprofit DAO. Sharing learnings and connecting the dots between how DAOs can revolutionize the philanthropic and nonprofit sectors. Including a full case study of SpiritDAO, the first on-chain spiritual community grounded in reimagined first principles of meaning and value.
